posts.post_content:
Wizards with FTV: Legends Decisions:  
What do we want to print for this?  
Sisay, obv.  
couple of portal 3 legends 'cause they are obnoxiously rare  
a bunch of other random legends  
oh, and an eldrazi.  
Which one? Emrakul?  
No, too predictable. Ulamog. He has a helmet.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: I suspect part of the reason they picked him over Emrakul is that Big E is banned in EDH. And Ulamog is better than Kozilek, because he has a relevant ability (indestructability) even after he's in play, or if he's cheated in.
posts.html:
I suspect part of the reason they picked him over Emrakul is that Big E is banned in EDH. And Ulamog is better than Kozilek, because he has a relevant ability (indestructability) even after he's in play, or if he's cheated in.

posts.post_content:
OK, Im going to shorten this rant into something...um, readable. :p  
  
Commander comes from EDH. Elder Dragon Highlander. Does anyone even remember the Elder Dragons from Legends anymore? This is From the Vault: Legends. Where the hell is my foil Vaevictis Asmadi? Or maybe Chromium? I'll take Arcaddes Sabboth, even. It's really not that hard. Just not Bolas. I mean, Bolas WOULD have been nice...if he wasn't already in a From the Vault. I would almost, almost be ok with an actual Double Vault appearance by Bolas, if it meant the set no longer looked like --  
  
  
From the Vault: New Stuff is Better than History. seriously. How many of these cards existed pre-8th Edition? Hell, how many of them existed pre-MENDING?! This isn't "From the Vault". This is "From my Trade Binder".   
  
  
I mean, this set really kind of kicks the whole idea of the From the Vault series in the balls. Dragons, Exiled, Relics, and Legends. What else is a good topic for the Vault? I think this set really might have kille... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
Personally, I have a preference to Ulamog over Emrakul (Emrakul actually dies to Ulamog :o). I mean Ulamog is a massive threat when he hits the board, and he's difficult to deal with, but he's more reasonable to deal with than Emrakul. Just my preference I suppose.  
  
I really do enjoy the "I play Emrakul with Elvish Piper, Rawr"  
".... I play Ulamog... Hai Emrakul.. Oh, Nvm, Bai Emrakul. Good talking to you"
posts.html:
